item.title: Meghann Fahy Admits ‘Sirens’ Emmy Nomination Was “Very Unexpected”
item.description: Fahy is nominated in the best lead actress in a limited or anthology series or movie category for her role in the Netflix show.

item.title: Pete Davidson Reveals Origins of ‘SNL’ Character Chad
item.description: “In eight years of ‘SNL,’ I had one character,” the actor said of the recurring role known for his “OK” catchphrase.

item.title: Bill Hader Reveals Anxiety Kept Him From Participating in ‘SNL50’ Sketch
item.description: The actor, who was a castmember on the NBC variety show from 2005-2013, was unexpectedly absent from this year’s 50th anniversary celebration.

item.title: Seth Meyers Says He’d Worry About His “Mental Health” If NBC’s ‘Late Night’ Gets Canceled
item.description: The future of late night remains uncertain, especially following the abrupt cancellation of CBS’s ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert.’

item.title: Seth Meyers Says He’d Worry About His “Mental Health” If NBC’s ‘Late Night’ Gets Canceled
item.description: The future of late night remains uncertain, especially following the abrupt cancellation of CBS’s ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert.’
